    Settings

    Settings

    AsyPlots.asy — Function.
    asy()

    Set the backend to Asymptote

    source
    AsyPlots.cairo — Function.
    cairo()

    Set the backend to Cairo

    source
    AsyPlots.junosvg — Function.
    junosvg()

    Set the default output format for the Juno plot pane to svg

    source
    AsyPlots.junopng — Function.
    junopng()

    Set the default output format for the Juno plot pane to png

    source
    AsyPlots.fitwidth — Function.
    fitwidth()

    Set the figures appearing in the Juno plot pane to match its width

    source
    AsyPlots.fitheight — Function.
    fitheight()

    Set the figures appearing in the Juno plot pane to match its height

    source
